constraints.name: capacity_constraint
constraints.description: 每天销售的蔬菜总量不能超过给定的上限 m

constraints.name: decay_constraint
constraints.description: 每种蔬菜每天结束时会按固定的数量变质，直到所有蔬菜都变质
constraints.formal: for each vegetable i, decay per day = x_i, total decay after d days = min(d * x_i, c_i)

constraints.name: initial_bonus_constraint
constraints.description: 每种蔬菜第一次销售时会获得额外收益 s_i
constraints.formal: if first_sale(i) then total_profit += a_i + s_i else total_profit += a_i

constraints.name: non_negative_inventory
constraints.description: 每种蔬菜的初始库存必须是非负的

constraints.name: distinct_queries
constraints.description: 每个问题中的 p_j 互不相同
constraints.formal: p_j are distinct for all j
